name: Google
body:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en"/>
<head>
	<title>Projec_GOOGLE</title>
	<style type="text/css">
		* {
			background:#ebebeb;
			margin:0;
			padding:0;
			border:0;
		}		
		
		body {
			background:url('http://teskostudio.com/StartPage/Images/bg.jpg');			
		}
		
		#searchBox {		
			position:fixed;	
			opacity:0;
		}
		
		.TextField {
			font: normal normal bold 3em/125% 'Raleway', Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;		
			color:gray;
			margin:0;
			padding:0;
			letter-spacing:0px;
			border:none;			
			border-bottom:#c9c9c9 1px solid;
			background:transparent;
			text-shadow: #fff 0 1px 1px;			
		}		
		
		.TextField:focus 
		{ 
			outline:none; 
		}
	</style>
	<link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Raleway:100' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>	
</head>
<html>
	<body>
		<section id="searchBox">
			<form method="get" action="http://www.google.com/search" target="_blank">
					<input name="q" type="text" class="TextField" maxlength="255"/>	
			</form>		
		</section>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1/jquery.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript">
			
			function resizer(){
				var nWidth = jQuery(window).width();
				
				if(nWidth <= 960){
					jQuery('#searchBox .TextField').css({'font-size' : '1.8em'});
				}else {
					jQuery('#searchBox .TextField').css({'font-size' : '3em'});
				}
				
				var nTheMiddle = jQuery('#searchBox').width();
				var xPos = nWidth * 0.5 - (nTheMiddle * 0.5);
				
				jQuery('#searchBox').css({'top' : '25%',
											'left' : xPos+'px'
				});
				
			}			
			
			function getFocus(){
				var focusHere = jQuery('#searchBox .TextField');
				focusHere = focusHere.focus();
			}					
			
			jQuery(document).ready(function(){
				
				jQuery(window).resize(function(){
					resizer();
				});
				jQuery(window).trigger('resize');					
				jQuery('body').hide();
				jQuery('#searchBox').css({'opacity' : '1'});
				jQuery('body').delay(500).fadeIn(500, function(){
					getFocus();	
				});
			});			
		</script>		
	</body>
</html>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
